Maine Ballot 󠁵󠁳󠁭🗳️󠁵󠁳󠁴󠁸󠁿

Jul 31, 2019

  • civictech
  • episode
  • cfa brigade
  • elections
  • open source

We are joined by User Experience Designer Shannon McHarg and Content Strategist Ryan Johnson, who both work at the Office of Natural Resources Revenue, an agency within the United States Department of the Interior. We’ll talk about an open source project they both contribute to called Maine Ballot.
